sn_tools.observations module¶

class sn_tools.observations.Observations(data, nseasons=10, season_length=95, names={'Nexp': 'numExposures', 'airmass': 'airmass', 'band': 'band', 'exptime': 'exptime', 'fiveSigmaDepth': 'fiveSigmaDepth', 'mjd': 'mjd', 'moonPhase': 'moonPhase', 'night': 'night', 'pixDec': 'pixDec', 'pixRa': 'pixRa', 'rawSeeing': 'seeingFwhm500', 'season': 'season', 'seeing': 'seeingFwhmEff', 'sky': 'sky'}, coadd_night=True)¶

Bases: object

class Observations Input ——— File (txt) with a list of observations (dumped from OpSim output for instance) Returns ——— seasons: the list of seasons with observations

by default : poor seasons (< 10 observations all bands) are removed

Methods

Coadd()
Coadd_Season_night(filt)
Get_Seasons(data, season_length) Gather list of observations
Load(filename) Load txt file of observations
Remove_Poor_Seasons() Remove seasons with too few obs (<10) Returns ——— List of seasons with at least 10 observations.

Get_Seasons(data, season_length)¶

Gather list of observations to make seasons Input ——— data : recordarray of observations

Returns:

seasons: the list of seasons with observations

each element of the list is a recordarray
Load(filename)¶
Load txt file of observations
Input

File (txt) with a list of observations (dumped from OpSim output for instance) Returns ——— recordarray of observations

Remove_Poor_Seasons()¶

Remove seasons with too few obs (<10) Returns ——— List of seasons with at least 10 observations.
